docs.title: Jam Xrd Guide
docs.text:
Welcome to Rage's Jam Xrd Guide! Learn mechanics, combos, and character strategies.

This doc is SIP.

To do: - Finish combos pages - Matchup page - Fix the light mode issue in the combo widgets - An easier way to access the character info/combos - New things

docs.title: Elphelt
docs.text:
PK Combos

Difficulty is considered without the IAD Geki input. Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

IAD Geki 5K | Corner only Extreme 956214K > 546(whiff) > 5K > 2H(1) > 546 dl P~K > dl 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Frame perfect combo on Elphelt with IAD Geki combo starter. Only works in the corner. You have to delay IAD Geki enough, otherwise Elphelt will be too low and Zekkei will connect on the first frame. Elphelt will be too high and the Puff Puff will whiff. After the 546(whiff) into the 5K, input 5K as 4K to be on time. You must delay the 546~P by 1, 2 or 3 frames. If you don't delay it or delay by 4f, it will connect on first frame. For the PuffPuff, there must a delay for the ~S from 236S by at least 2 frames. You can delay it by a maximum of 4. This makes it a 3f timing Thanks to Kkots for finding this route

docs.title: Johnny
docs.text:
PK Combos

Difficulty is considered without the IAD Geki input. Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

IAD Carded Geki c.S f.S 2H(1) c.S 2S c.S 2S 2H(1) 6K(1) 5K 2S 5K 2H 2P 2PP c.S f.S 2H(1) | Everywhere Easy 956214K > c.S > f.S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 219

Most damaging combo route without spending other resources 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

c.S | Everywhere Easy 956214K > c.S > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 217

Easy c.S route, you can do both 2H hits or go for (1) hit. Timings may vary if you go for double or (1) 2H hit into 546P~K 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

2S | Everywhere Easy 956214K > 2S > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 217

Easy 2S route, you can do both 2H hits or go for (1) hit. Timings may vary if you go for double or (1) 2H hit into 546P~K 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

c.S 2S 2H(1) | Everywhere Easy 956214K > c.S > 2S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 216

Common c.S > 2S > 2H(1) route. Works on Johnny as well. 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

6K(1) | Everywhere Easy 956214K > 6K(1) > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 208

Easy 6K(1) route, you can do both 2H hits or go for (1) hit. Timings may vary if you go for double or (1) 2H hit into 546P~K 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

5K | Everywhere Easy 956214K > 5K > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 205

Easy 5K route, you can do both 2H hits or go for (1) hit. Timings may vary if you go for double or (1) 2H hit into 546P~K 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

2S 5K 2H(1) | Everywhere Hard 956214K > 2S > 5K > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 204

This is a bit of a harder combo as the dash after the IAD can be a bit tight to land 2S afterwards.Less hard if you hit the opponent crounching.

2P | Everywhere Easy 956214K > 2P > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 199

Easy 2P route, you can do both 2H hits or go for (1) hit. Timings may vary if you go for double or (1) 2H hit into 546P~K 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

2PP | Everywhere Easy 956214K > 2PP > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 178 / 181

Easy 2PP route, you can do both 2H hits or go for (1) hit. Timings may vary if you go for double or (1) 2H hit into 546P~K 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

Difficulty is considered without the Kara c.Geki input. Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

Kara Carded Geki c.S f.S 2H(1) c.S 2S c.S 2S 2H(1) 6K(1) 2S 5K 2H(1) 5K 2P 2PP c.S f.S 2H(1) | Everywhere Easy 236S214KK > c.S > f.S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

docs.text:
Standard Combos

Here's the list to the standard combo routes you want to go for as Jam!
